name: Aarong Dairy Butter
description:
Aarong Butter is a dairy product made from fresh or curdled cream or milk, separating butterfat from buttermilk. It is commonly used as a spread in cooking, such as baking, making sauces, and pan frying. Butter contains butterfat, milk protein, and water. Often made from cow's milk, butter can also be made from the milk of other mammals, including sheep, goats, buffaloes, and yaks. Salt, flavoring, and preservatives are sometimes added to butter. Rendering butter produces clarified butter or ghee, which is almost entirely butterfat.

name: Milk Vita Butter
description:
Unlike other butter brands, milk vita butter has comparatively low calories in it which reduces the risk f getting fat. The nutrients of milk vita butter are very rich because it is made of pure milk and cream. You can use milk vita butter in many of the items. Also can use as breakfast spreading in your bread and feel the taste and creamy texture of the butter.

name: Pran Butter (Fresco Container)
description:
PRAN Premium Butter in the 200 gm Fresco Container is a rich and creamy butter, ideal for spreading on toast or incorporating into various dishes. This premium butter is produced by PRAN Dairy, which sources its dairy ingredients from its own Dairy Hub.

name: Ultra Butter Pasteurized
description:
Ultra Butter Pasteurized 200 gm is a high-quality butter made from fresh cream, processed through pasteurization to ensure safety and extend its shelf life. With a smooth, creamy texture and rich flavor, this butter is perfect for a variety of culinary uses, from spreading on bread to cooking and baking. Ingredients:Fresh CreamSalt (optional)Pasteurizing agents Uses:As a Spread: Ideal for spreading on toast, bread, or crackers.Cooking: Can be used for sautéing, frying, or as an ingredient in sauces.Baking: Perfect for baking cakes, cookies, pastries, and other baked goods.Flavoring: Adds a rich, creamy taste to dishes like mashed potatoes, pasta, or vegetables. Brand: UltraPack Size: 200 gm

With a smooth, creamy texture and rich flavor, this butter is perfect for a variety of culinary uses, from spreading on bread to cooking and baking.
 
Ingredients:
Fresh Cream
Salt (optional)
Pasteurizing agents
 
Uses:
As a Spread: Ideal for spreading on toast, bread, or crackers.
Cooking: Can be used for sautéing, frying, or as an ingredient in sauces.
Baking: Perfect for baking cakes, cookies, pastries, and other baked goods.
Flavoring: Adds a rich, creamy taste to dishes like mashed potatoes, pasta, or vegetables.
 
Brand: Ultra
Pack Size: 200 gm

name: Anchor Unsalted Butter
description:
Anchor Unsalted Butter is a popular brand of butter in India. It is available in various sizes, including 227 grams. This type of butter is unsalted, meaning it does not contain added salt. It can be used in a variety of recipes, including baking, cooking, and spreading on toast. Unsalted butter is often preferred by chefs and bakers as it allows the true flavor of the butter to shine through.

name: Red Cow Butter Oil
description:
Red Cow Butter Oil is made from pure cow's milk. It contains energy, protein, carbohydrate, and fat. New Zealand Dairy Product BD Ltd.
